Articles.Content: Unfortunately I cant post on other topics but KSP2 for now but if its not obvious enough I stopped makin the Dusk Planet Pack but I have got back into modding and am currently making a new mod soon. I got over the textuing hurdles but I am still trying to find better solutions to make textures. Stay tuned for updates (maybe)
Hi @NimNimix, your thread has been moved from KSP 2 discussion to Add-on discussion.
